Author: Martin Dube
Description: [*** Local only ****] These guys built their own digital lock at the entrance. Ho noes!
How to: Run the combination lock which is hardcoded in the code

Author: Martin Dube
Description: [*** Local only ****] Hmm a TV in a conference room. Ever heard of TV's secret areas?
How to: Using IR, run the right combination. Find that the last signal can be found by holding any key.

Author: Martin Dube
Description: [*** Local only ****] Party Time!
How to: Turn all lights ON by solving any challenge, sending an IR signal and holding button #2.

Author: Martin Dube
Description: [*** Local only ****] Enough recon. Build your way to the core of the system. You are allowed to connect a single GPIO wire on the arduino.
How to: Build a custom made serial port using python and a raspberry pi or an arduino.

Author: Martin Dube
Description: [*** Local only ****] Exploit the race condition with a single cable.
How to: Plug the cable in G42 and B59. Set potentiometer to 0 and increase slowly until it reach 1000.

Author: Martin Dube
Description: [*** Local only ****] Finally, trigger the fire alarm before leaving. You are allowed to move the DALLAS temperature sensor.
How to: Switch the sensor in the opposite side. This will make the sensor very hot. Then plug it back.
